reviewText: After much reading and research, I eventually came across this documentary style series on Google video or somewhere. It does an excellent job of explaining everything. I'm very glad to have came across it.

But by no means is this video / DVD
complete. Judging from the hysteical
review that was posted before mine,
somebody must have gotten their ox
gored. The Christians definately win
this round. Good job, Mr. Ankerberg!

This is a run-of-the-mill rant from a so-called Christian, a typical hate-monger. Ankerberg's claims have been thoroughly debunked and his use of outdated and completely wrong information completely destroys whatever credibility he claims to have.
However there will always be a group of people willing to believe the worst of their fellow men...so for those of this ilk Ankerberg no doubt brings a warm and fuzzy feeling.
